charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] asked Silver to help
out with some training.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1101_020:
In the middle of a tough session, Silver started to
talk about what was needed to win in battles.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_030:
What determines whether you win or lose in a
Pokémon battle is your judgment as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_040:
Even with a strong partner, you could still lose if
your judgment is bad.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_050:
Hmph! I guess you could say I was like that not
too long ago.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_0401_070:
I didn’t care about any Pokémon unless it was
strong enough to win...
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_0402_090:
I didn’t care about any Pokémon unless it was
strong enough to win...
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_100:
That’s how I used to think. I focused only on my
Pokémon and ignored my own weaknesses.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_110:
Things are different now. Even if I had the most
powerful Pokémon in the world, I’d know better
than to rely solely on its strength.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_120:
I know I’ve still got a ways to go to before I
become the best Trainer.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_130:
I’m sure I’m not drawing out my partner’s full
strength. When we lose, it’s because I wasn’t
good enough.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_0401_150:
Of course. Chalking up a victory or defeat to their
Pokémon is how a weak Trainer thinks...
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_0402_170:
Of course it is. Chalking up a victory or defeat to
their Pokémon is how a weak Trainer thinks...
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_180: Hmph. Maybe I said more than I should’ve.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_190:
That’s it for training. I want to give my Pokémon
a break.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_200:
The greatest Trainer should always be aware of
their partner’s physical condition and act
accordingly...I guess.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_210:
My Pokémon couldn’t do much for me if it
were broken. You have to take care of your
belongings, after all...
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_270:
I’m done treating Pokémon like those weaklings in
Team Rocket did.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_280:
Anyway, training time is over. C’mon. Go rest
wherever you want.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_290:
Uh... Couldn’t you go somewhere with a bit more
room? You’re not exactly small.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_300:
Hey! I told you to go wherever you want!
Tch! What’s with you?
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_310: Is what I’m saying not reaching it or something?
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_360:
Are you saying you know what my Pokémon
is thinking?
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_0301_370: It wants to stay by your side, Silver.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_0401_380:
Is that so? Then I guess it’s doing what I told it
to do...
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_0302_390: It’s resting exactly where it wants!
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_0402_400: Hm. I guess it’s doing what I told it to do...
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_430:
I came here to help you train, but I guess it turns
out I could learn a thing or two from you, too.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_440:
“Love and trust toward Pokémon.” That’s what
Lance said. Looks like [Name:PlayerNickname ]
gets it...
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_450:
I guess it’d be all right to join you for a little
more training some other time.
charaepi_ch0133_00_shilver/2301_1201_460:
But make sure you’re ready. I hate weaklings, so
I’ll leave you behind if you can’t keep up!
